messages.subject: Re: [nihonto] the stolen sword "joke"
messages.msgSnippet: All- The joke was all my doing, a lapse in judgement perhaps as some said. I take full responsibility and I am even now communicating with Bob about how best
messages.messageBody:
All-
The joke was all my doing, a lapse in judgement perhaps as some said.
I take full responsibility and I am even now communicating with Bob
about how best to apologize to the hotel staff. If anyone has
reconsidered the Chicago show as a destination, I beg you rest assured
nothing was stolen at the show. I took charge of an item that was
forgotten by a friend of mine and meant to have some fun at his
expense, not the hotel staff or the fine folks who run the Chicago
Taikai.

Thomas C Helm Jr.
